name: Magic Nail Spa Salon
description:
Magic Nail Spa Salon is a fun and interactive game from Lembah Games. Now you can own your own nail salon where you can color, cut, and dress your very own animated princess! Become the fashion stylist you’ve always wanted to be and redesign your model exactly how you wish. Girls nail spa salon is full of interactive features and innovative tools to help you become the hairstylist you’ve always dreamed of.

Choose your own model!
Magic Nail Spa Salon lets you choose 1 girl from a selection of 6 (1 of them are free with the app and 5 others are available with in app purchase). Once you’ve chosen the perfect model for your salon, you can then go and choose from a virtually endless amount of style making tools. From nail polish, tattoos, to accessories, this game lets you do everything you’ve ever wanted with just a click of a button.
